params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.enable_ipv4
params.description: Whether the instance should be assigned an IPv4 address or not.

params.name: data.private_network
params.description: The resource link for the VPC network from which the Cloud SQL instance is accessible for private IP. For example, projects/myProject/global/networks/default. This setting can be updated, but it cannot be removed after it is set.

params.name: data.require_ssl
params.description: Whether SSL connections over IP should be enforced or not.

params.name: data.authorized_networks
params.description: The list of external networks that are allowed to connect to the instance using the IP. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CIDR_notation#CIDR_notation, also known as 'slash' notation (e.g. 192.168.100.0/24).
